Text: u r welcome! The quality is not very good but watchable.

Thanks to Nepotu & seeders.

Really appreciated here in Central America where one can't see that shite!

Moto3 races much more exiting than MotoGP this year IMO.
u both r welcome, my friends! I think that the motors in Moto3 are more equals.

It's more than the motors. The budget of the teams  are more similar. The problem with MotoGP is that there is a 20 to 1 budget difference like in F1. Factory bikes @ 2 million a piece vs CRT @ $80,000...

If you could do also the BSB (British Superbike), probably one of the most competitive series, it would appreciated.

I could only find a Russian Eurosport version of the May 6 2012 race which I uploaded here: BSB.2012.Round03.Oulton.Park.Eurosport2.MPEG-2.Russian-ashu http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7250608
Well yes, you have reason. With BSB, I don't know, I'll try to help you, if I find something different than round 3. Cheers bro!

great stuff!
and yes the BSB races are the best in the world at this time, too bad that they are very tough to find.
